title: I refunded a skin to get a snowdown capsule and got the skin I refunded
body: I refunded a skin to get a snowdown capsule and got the skin I refunded and it won't let me use orange essence to get the skin again. It says I "own" the skin, however, I refunded it so I shouldn't own it anymore.

replies.body: Yeeeaaaa that's pretty heckin' unfortunate. Hit up our game team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should have a way to get that reversed so it feels a bit better.
